heading: Today
text: Any early sun east giving way to thickening clouds.  Snow developing in NY midday, spreading east this afternoon.  Accumulations of a dusting to 2 inches.  Highs from the teens north, to low 20s south.  Winds light, mainly south less than 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Periods of light snow tapering off.  Additional amounts of a dusting to an inch.  A few breaks in the clouds late.  Not as cold.  Lows in the teens, except 5 to 10 above through Quebec, the St. Lawrence, and northeast.  Winds light, mainly southeast less than 10 mph.

heading: Tuesday
text: Some periods of morning sun, then clouds returning. Milder. Highs in the upper 20s to low 30s, except mid to upper 30s southwest VT.  Winds light, mainly southeast less than 10 mph.
